para.text: Initial Concentrations in Lakes in GWT Model

In the model, both of the lakes have initial concentrations of zero. To specify the initial concentrations, edit the two objects that define lakes in the Object Properties dialog box and assign the initial lake concentration in the Lake Transport package. It would also be possible to specify solute added to the lake via precipitation or runoff on the
tabs but those are not needed in this model.
